title: Veterans Affairs Medical Center Hosting Meeting
title_page: Veterans Affairs Medical Center Hosting Meeting
maintext:
PLAINS TWP. — The Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Plains Twp. is hosting a public meeting for veterans, family members and the public to provide feedback on VA operations.
The “town hall” meeting is also an opportunity to provide recommendations for VA programs and to access help applying for VA programs. Medical center employees will be available to help veterans with filing claims, learning the status of claims and other benefits services.
The meeting will take place 5 p.m. March 27 at the fifth floor media room of the Veterans Affairs Medical Center, 1111 East End Blvd., Plains Twp.
